item.title: Tracking Trump's picks to serve in his Cabinet, administration
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump is rolling out names for top jobs in his administration.

item.title: Biden to allow Ukraine to use longer-range US missiles in Russia: Sources
item.description: President Joe Biden has authorized Ukraine to use long-range ATACMS missiles inside Russia, two U.S. officials confirmed to ABC News on Sunday.

item.title: Hegseth paid settlement to woman who accused him of sexual assault, lawyer says
item.description: A lawyer for Hegseth said in a statement that he settled in December 2020 only because he feared his career would suffer if her allegations were made ...

item.title: WATCH: Police capture 'noncompliant' pig on the loose
item.description: A "noncompliant" pig led police on a chase around a Tacoma, Washington, neighborhood after getting loose.

item.title: Gold pocket watch given to captain who rescued Titanic survivors sells for nearly $2M
item.description: A gold pocket watch given to the ship captain who rescued 700 survivors from the Titanic has sold at auction for nearly $2 million
